mapper.insert: insert into tb_member(num,title, writer, content)values((select nvl(max(num),0)+1 from tb_member), #{member_id},#{member_name}, #{content})
mapper.update: update tb_member set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select num, member_email, member_name, member_phone, member_address1, member_address2, sns_approval, member_zipcode from tb_member a, tb_order b where num=#{num}

select * from tb_member where 1=1
AND member_address1 like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' order by num desc
AND member_name like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' order by num desc

select * from(select rownum rnum, num, member_email,member_name, member_phone, member_address1, member_address2,sns_approval, member_zipcode from (select * from tb_member order by num))where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
